product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Product rating
product.description: Average rating from customers

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Mount/Stand features
product.description: Details the specific characteristics of a product's mount or stand, like adjustable angle or foldable

product.name: Display technology
product.description: Defines the type of screen technology used in a product, e.g. LED, e-ink

product.name: Native aspect ratio
product.description: Specifies the original aspect ratio of a display, typically for projectors; e.g. 16:8

product.name: Television specialized features
product.description: Identifies unique capabilities of a TV, like voice control or built-in soundbar

product.name: Display resolution
product.description: Defines resolution of a digital display, e.g. 1280 x 1024, full HD

product.name: Audio technology
product.description: Specifies the technology used in audio devices, such as AAC or Dolby atmos

product.name: Smart TV platform
product.description: Defines the software platform used by a smart television, such as Android or Roku TV

product.name: Connection type
product.description: Specifies the type of connection used by electronics, such as wired or Bluetooth

product.name: HDR format
product.description: Specifies the High Dynamic Range (HDR) for televisions, e.g. HDR10, Dolby Vision

product.name: Energy efficiency class (HDR)
product.description: Specifies the energy efficiency of HDR-enabled devices, typically televisions; e.g. A+++

product.name: Energy efficiency class (SDR)
product.description: Specifies the energy efficiency of SDR-enabled devices, typically televisions; e.g. A+++

product.name: Device interface
product.description: Specifies the method of connection between electronic devices, e.g. HDMI, USB

product.name: Mounting type
product.description: Specifies how a product is installed or attached, such as clip-on or suction cup

product.name: Connectivity technology
product.description: Defines the method of data transfer in a product, e.g. Bluetooth, USB

product.name: Audio output channel
product.description: Indicates the number of channels or speaker configuration that a sound system can output to, such as 2 or 5.1

product.name: Audio purpose
product.description: Specifies the intended use or location for audio products, such as car audio or home cinema

product.name: Speaker design
product.description: Defines the physical and functional design of speakers, such as subwoofer or tower

product.name: Speaker technology
product.description: Defines the technology used in the speaker's design, e.g. dynamic, electrostatic

product.name: Speaker features
product.description: Identifies special capabilities of audio speakers, like noise cancellation or voice control

product.name: Contrast ratio (typical)
product.description: Indicates the display's contrast ratio, e.g. 3000:1

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 1
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 2
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 3
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 4
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.
